Articles.Content: I would really like KSP to recognize my joystick with throttle control. Right now i have it rigged through a few joystick buttons, but i would love to just pull back on my throttle stick.
Well, I don't know what's up with your setup but KSP works with the throttle of my joystick just fine. I only ever use it when space planeing, though.
KSP works with most joysticks already. It does have issues with some, but that's not something Squad can do very much about, as all joystick compatibility is done through Unity.
